name: Retrieve Settings
info:
Retrieve an automation configuartaion object attachment from vault, or from Redis if alread exist, if not existing, it will be stored in Redis. 

### Node information
:Initial Release (string): With building blocks version x.x.x
:Description (string): Retrieve an automation configuartaion object attachment from vault, or from Redis if alread exist, if not existing, it will be stored in Redis. 

### Inputs
: args.settings_name (string) : *(optional)* the name of the automation configuartaion object in vault, if not provided, the name '-client_id-__settings' will be used. 
: args.attachment_name (string) : *(optional)* the name of the object attachment in vault, it has to be a .json file, defaults to 'settings.json'. 
: args.keep (boolean) : *(optional)* If **false**, delete the args object. Defaults to **false**.
: args.expire (integer): *(optional)* Number of seconds after redis deletes the topic automatically. Default is 24h.

### Outputs
1. Success
: payload (object): attachment converted to an object/array

1. Failure
: payload (object): Error message on channel 2

name: Check for existing CTA Application Event
get automation configuration settings object id

rules.to: "SELECT id, name__v"	&" FROM automation_configuration__c" 	&" WHERE name__v = '"	& args_sub.settings_name	&"' AND status__v = 'active__v'"

name: Try to read settings from Redis

rules.to: "select id, name__v, study_alias__c, product__v, product__vr.name__v, (select id, name__v, product__c, product__cr.name__v, product_family__c, product_family__cr.name__v, product_variant__c, product_variant__cr.name__v from clinical_study_products__cr), (select id, project__cr.name__v from project_clinical_studies__cr), (select id, name__v, therapeutic_indication__c, therapeutic_indication__cr.name__v from therapeutic_indication_clinical_studies__cr) from clinical_study__v where id='" & study_id & "'"

rules.v: $distinct(study.clinical_study_products__cr.data.product_family__c) != study.product__v /* some products do not match primary product familiy */

"select therapeutic_indication__c, therapeutic_indication__cr.name__v from product_family_indication__c where status__v='active__v' and product_family__c='" & study.product__v & "'"
[{"type":"Inconsistent Data","message":"At least one indication of the clinical study is not valid for the primary product family."}]

"; Shelf life: " & params.shelf_life : ""),	       "keywords__c": "clinical_initial_cta__c",	       "rec__c": rec_id,	       "global_application__v": global_application,	       "content_plan_template__v": "0EP00000004B425",	       "project_id__c": study.project_clinical_studies__cr.data[0].project__c	       	   }	]

name: Check if non_CTR countries are selected

rules.to: $distinct(payload.data).{	   "country_id": country__rim,	   "country_name": `country__rimr.name__v`,	   "country_code": `country__rimr.country_code__rim`,	   "region_id": region__rim,	   "region_name": `region__rimr.name__v`,	   "application_type_id": cv_1__rim,	   "application_type": `cv_1__rimr.name__v`	} ~> $filter(function($v) {	    $v.region_name = "European Union" and $v.application_type != "CTA Regulation" and $v.application_type != "Paediatric Investigation Plan (PIP)" and $v.application_type != "Orphan Drug Designation Application"or	    $v.country_name = "United States" and $v.application_type = "Investigational New Drug (IND)" or	    $v.region_name != "European Union" and $v.country_name != "United States" and $v.application_type != "Paediatric Investigation Plan (PIP)"	})

application_types[country_id=null]	/* Replace null countries with a list of all countries in that region */	~> $map(function($t) {$.countries[region_id=$t.region_id] ~> $map(function($c) {$merge([$t,$c])})})	/* Reduce list of lists to single list */	~> $reduce(function($i, $v) { $append($i, $v) })	/* Join with non-null countries */	~> $append(application_types[country_id!=null])	/* Filter out already existing applications */	/* by using the Countries in Lead Country*/	~> $filter(function($v) {$count(applications[lead_market__rim=$v.country_id and application_type__rim=$v.application_type_id])=0})	/* by using the Countries in Application Country join*/	~> $filter(function($v) {$count(application_countries[country__rim=$v.country_id and `application__rimr.application_type__rim`=$v.application_type_id])=0})	/* Filter out Common (EU) and Common (GCC) */	~> $filter(function($v) {$v.country_name != "Common (EU)" and $v.country_name != "Common (GCC)"})	/* Sort by name */	~> $sort(function($l, $r) {$l.country_name > $r.country_name})

"select id, name__v, country_code__rim, region__v, region__vr.name__v from country__v where status__v = 'active__v' and id !='" & $.lead_country[0].country_id & "' AND " & (cms_countries.country_id ~> $map(function($v) {"id!='" & $v & "'"}) ~> $join(" AND "))
"select id, name__v,lead_market__rim, application_type__rim from application__v where clinical_study__c = '" & study_id & "'"

SELECT country__rim, country__rimr.name__v, country__rimr.country_code__rim, region__rim, region__rimr.name__v, cv_1__rim, cv_1__rimr.name__v FROM constraint__rim WHERE applicable_product_type__v = 'drug__v' AND constraint_scope__v = 'investigational__c' AND status__v = 'active__v' AND cv_1__rimr.controlled_vocabulary_type__rim = 'application_type__rim' AND cv_1__rimr.status__v = 'active__v'
Please select the target countries for new CTAs
"For Study " & flow.study.name__v & " " & study.study_alias__c & ". Leave empty if not applicable."

$distinct(payload.data).{	   "country_id": country__rim,	   "country_name": `country__rimr.name__v`,	   "country_code": `country__rimr.country_code__rim`,	   "region_id": region__rim,	   "region_name": `region__rimr.name__v`,	   "application_type_id": cv_1__rim,	   "application_type": `cv_1__rimr.name__v`	} ~> $filter(function($v) {	    $v.region_name = "European Union" and $v.application_type = "CTA Regulation" and $v.country_id !=$.lead_country.country_id	})

application_types[country_id=null]	/* Replace null countries with a list of all countries in that region */	~> $map(function($t) {$.countries[region_id=$t.region_id] ~> $map(function($c) {$merge([$t,$c])})})	/* Reduce list of lists to single list */	~> $reduce(function($i, $v) { $append($i, $v) })	/* Join with non-null countries */	~> $append(application_types[country_id!=null])	/* Filter out already existing applications */	/* by using the Countries in Lead Country*/	~> $filter(function($v) {$count(applications[lead_market__rim=$v.country_id and application_type__rim=$v.application_type_id])=0})	/* by using the Countries in Application Country join*/	~> $filter(function($v) {$count(application_countries[country__rim=$v.country_id and `application__rimr.application_type__rim`=$v.application_type_id])=0})	/* Filter out Common (EU) and Common (GCC) */	~> $filter(function($v) {$v.country_name != "Common (EU)" and $v.country_name != "Common (GCC)"})	/* Sort by name */	~> $sort(function($l, $r) {$l.country_name > $r.country_name})
Please select all the participating countries of the CTR process
"Lead Country is set as European Union for new CTR for Study " & study.name__v & " " & study.study_alias__c

SELECT country__rim, country__rimr.name__v, country__rimr.country_code__rim, region__rim, region__rimr.name__v, cv_1__rim, cv_1__rimr.name__v FROM constraint__rim WHERE applicable_product_type__v = 'drug__v' AND constraint_scope__v = 'investigational__c' AND status__v = 'active__v' AND cv_1__rimr.controlled_vocabulary_type__rim = 'application_type__rim' AND cv_1__rimr.status__v = 'active__v' AND region__rimr.name__v='European Union'

"select id, name__v from submission__v where " & (submission_ids ~> $map(function($v) {"id='" & $v & "'"}) ~> $join(" OR "))

[	    submissions ~> $map(	       function($submission) {	           study.clinical_study_products__cr.data.{	               "submission__rim": $submission.id,	               "pharmaceutical_product__rim": product__c,	               "product_detail__rim": product_variant__c	        }	    }	    ) ~> $reduce(	       function($accumulator, $value) {$append($accumulator, $value)}	    )	]

[	    ros ~> $map(	       function($ro) {	           study.clinical_study_products__cr.data.{	               "regulatory_objective__v": $ro.id,	               "drug_product__v": product__c,	               "product_detail__v": product_variant__c	        }	    }	    ) ~> $reduce(	       function($accumulator, $value) {$append($accumulator, $value)}	    )	]
"select id, name__v from regulatory_objective__rim where " & (ro_ids ~> $map(function($v) {"id='" & $v & "'"}) ~> $join(" OR "))
select id from controlled_vocabulary__rim where controlled_vocabulary_type__rim = 'regulatory_objective_type_global__c' and name__v = 'New Clinical Trial' and status__v = 'active__v'

select id, country__rim, country__rimr.name__v, object_type__v, object_type__vr.name__v, health_authority__v, health_authority__vr.name__v from constraint__rim where object_type__vr.name__v='Health Authority'

name: application type selection
template:
Please define scope of the request for study

{{ study.name__v }} {{ study.study_alias__c }}

CTA Application CTA Amendment

{{#hiddenfields}} {{/hiddenfields}}
CTA Application:
     Planning phase Create Event and CTA Content Plan (The first step to create tracking objects for a CTA is the creation of Event(s). When IMPD information is available or At time of document collection, the Event and Content Plan can be created)

     Preparation phase Create Country Application(s) (Applications would only be created if not yet available. Therefore, it is strongly recommended to first conduct a search for already existing applications. The corresponding CTA Amendment Event is needed to perform this action.)

     Preparation phase Create Related Records (When the final core package is ready for dispatch, Regulatory Objective and Submission records must be created to track the submission process. The corresponding CTA Amendment Event and Application(s) of the involved countries are needed to perform this action.)

{{#hiddenfields}} {{/hiddenfields}}
CTA Amendment:
     Planning phase Create Event and CTA Content Plan (The first step to create tracking objects for a CTA is the creation of Event(s). Under Event you can set the scope of the to be changed details for all impacted countries.)

     Preparation phase Create Country Application(s) (Usually the applications are only needed when first CTA application and only need to be created if not ye available. Therefore, it is strongly recommended to first conduct a search for already existing applications. The corresponding CTA Application Event is needed to perform this action.)

     Preparation phase Create Related Records (When the final core package is ready for dispatch, Regulatory Objective and Submission records have to be created to track the submission process. The corresponding CTA Amendment Event and Application(s) of the involved countries are needed to perform this action.)

rules.to: "select id, product__v, product__vr.name__v from application__v where object_type__vr.api_name__v='global_application__v' and product__v='" & study.product__v & "'"

[	   {	       "name": "study_id",	       "value": study_id	    },	    {	        "name": "job_type",	        "value": job.job_type	    },	    {	        "name": "job_scope",	        "value": job.job_scope	    },	    {	        "name": "event_id",	        "value": event_id	    },	    {	        "name": "created_application_ids",	        "value": created_application_ids	    },	    {	        "name": "created_event_id",	        "value": created_event_id	    }	]

"select id, name__v, lead_market__rim, (select name__v, region__v, reporting_region__c from lead_market__rimr), created_date__v from application__v where id in (select application__c from application_clinical_studies__cr where clinical_study__c='" & study_id & "') and " & app_filter

"select id, name__v, brave_event_code__cr.name__v, event_description__c, keywords__c, state__v from event__rim where object_type__vr.api_name__v = 'clinical_study_event__c' and applicable_product_type__v = 'drug__v'and keywords__c != 'clinical_initial_cta__c' and id in (select id from event_clinical_studies__vr where clinical_study__v='" & study_id & "') and state__v != 'inactive_state__c' and State__v != 'cancelled_state__c'"

payload.data.{	    "event_id": id,	   "event_name": name__v,	   "rec": `brave_event_code__cr.name__v` != null ? `brave_event_code__cr.name__v` : "N/A",	   "event_description": event_description__c,	   "keyword": $reduce(keywords__c[]@$kw.[$$.event_keyword[Name=$kw].Title],function($i,$j){$i & "," & $j}) != null ? $reduce(keywords__c[]@$kw.[$$.event_keyword[Name=$kw].Title],function($i,$j){$i & "," & $j}) : "N/A"		}
Please select the Event for which records would be created

"select id, name__v, study_alias__c, product__v, product__vr.name__v, (select id, name__v, product__c, product__cr.name__v, product_family__c, product_family__cr.name__v, product_variant__c, product_variant__cr.name__v from clinical_study_products__cr), (select id, name__v, therapeutic_indication__c, therapeutic_indication__cr.name__v from therapeutic_indication_clinical_studies__cr) from clinical_study__v where id='" & study_id & "'"

"select id, name__v, study_alias__c, product__v, product__vr.name__v, (select id, name__v, product__c, product__cr.name__v, product_family__c, product_family__cr.name__v, product_variant__c, product_variant__cr.name__v from clinical_study_products__cr), (select id, name__v, therapeutic_indication__c, therapeutic_indication__cr.name__v from therapeutic_indication_clinical_studies__cr) from clinical_study__v where id='" & study_id & "'"
"select application__v from submission__v where id in (select submission__rim from event_submissions__rimr where event__rim='" & event_id & "')"

name: get automation configuration settings object id

rules.to: "SELECT id, name__v"	&" FROM automation_configuration__c" 	&" WHERE name__v = '"	& args.settings_name	&"' AND status__v = 'active__v'"
